item.title: How to Help Me
item.description: [!info] Draft This is a Draft. It may not comply with the site Templates. See [[Content Lifecycle]] for more information on Drafts.

item.title: Outline of Page Templates
item.description: Templates are premade guidelines for how to format content on this site. As pages are revisited and refined, they are moved to be more and more compliant with the site templates.

item.title: Outline of Polyamory
item.description: Polyamory is the practice of having and maintaining multiple close relationships at once. Related Outlines (List of nearby ideaspaces, should only link to other Outline)
